Package it.polimi.vovarini.common.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbruptEndEvent
    Raised when the RemoteView loses connection with the client.
    AvailableCardsEvent
    Represents that the elected player has chosen which cards will be available during the game.
    BoardUpdateEvent
    Represents that the board content has changed (i.e.
    BuildEvent
    Represents the player's intention to build a block.
    CardAssignmentEvent
    Represents that a Player has been assigned a specific GodCard.
    CardChoiceEvent
    Represents that a player has chosen his god.
    ChangeWorkerEvent
    Represents the choice from a player to change his selected Worker
    CurrentPlayerChangedEvent
    Represents that the current player has changed.
    FirstPlayerEvent
    Raised after the first client connects.
    GameEvent
    Represents an abstract event related to the game.
    GameEventManager
    Manager to bind listeners and raise events when necessary
    GameEventManagerTest  
    GameStartEvent
    Represents the start of the game (all players have chosen both a nickname and a GodCard, then they placed their workers on the board).
    GodCardUpdateEvent
    Represents that the godCard skills have changed (i.e.
    GodSelectionStartEvent
    Represents that all players have registered and the selection/assignment of the god cards can now begin.
    InvalidNicknameEvent
    Represents receiving a bad nickname choice by the player
    LossEvent
    Represents the fact a certain player (losingPlayer) has lost inside the game
    MovementEvent
    Represents a Player's intention to move their current Worker to end.
    NewPlayerEvent
    Represents that a registration was successful and a new Player was added to the game.
    NumberOfPlayersChoiceEvent  
    PhaseUpdateEvent
    Represents that the current Phase of the Game has changed.
    PlaceYourWorkersEvent
    Signals to the target player that he can place his workers on the board.
    PlayerInfoUpdateEvent
    Represents that the player object has been updated.
    RegistrationEvent
    Represents a request to be registered as a player with the given nickname.
    RegistrationStartEvent  
    SelectYourCardEvent
    Signals to the target player that he has to choose a god among the available ones.
    SkipEvent
    Represents a Phase skip.
    SpawnWorkerEvent
    Represents the initial position choice for the Player's current Worker.
    UndoEvent
    Represents a "Ctrl+Z" on the game: should result in the last action being undone.
    VictoryEvent
    Signals pointing the winner player to all the others
    WorkerSelectionEvent
    Represents a Player's selection among their Workers.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    GameEventListener
